entry.summary: AVIF (AV1 Image File Format) is a modern image file format specification for storing images that offer a much more significant file reduction when compared to other formats like JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WebP. Version 1.0.0 of the AVIF specification ‚Ä¶ Useful Tools for Creating AVIF Images originally published on CSS-Tricks. You should get the newsletter.
